title: Bayonne library offers Tech Thursday classes - The Hudson Reporter
content: Bayonne library offers Tech Thursday classes  The Hudson Reporter
description: Each Thursday in May, the Bayonne Public Library will offer a Tech Thursday class from 2:30 to 3:30 p.m. in the basement with Adult Services Librarian Bill Fischer. The class aims to help those: who want to learn how to use Facebook to connect with friends and family, but never knew who to ask; who need […]
